40#include <sys/cdefs.h>
41#if 0
42#define RCSID "Id: eui64.c,v 1.6 2002/12/04 23:03:32 paulus Exp "
43static const char rcsid[] = RCSID;
44#else
45__RCSID("$NetBSD: eui64.c,v 1.4 2014/10/25 21:11:37 christos Exp $");
46#endif
47
48#include "pppd.h"
49
50
51/*
52 * eui64_ntoa - Make an ascii representation of an interface identifier
53 */
54char *
55eui64_ntoa(e)
56 eui64_t e;
57{
58 static char buf[32];
59
60 snprintf(buf, 32, "%02x%02x:%02x%02x:%02x%02x:%02x%02x",
61 e.e8[0], e.e8[1], e.e8[2], e.e8[3],
62 e.e8[4], e.e8[5], e.e8[6], e.e8[7]);
63 return buf;
64}
